description: Has many features. Saves data in the database, and it's a more reliable and faster method instead of storing it in xml, for example. Can backup while saving. This is a very convenient program for me.
Not sure spent ages trying to change the currency which could not do, could not get any on the field to work and found the whole program difficult to understand.
not sure what happened. the app cant start, cant uninstall.
This application will not start. It is missing "/snap/skrooge/24/kf5-locale-gen".
Looked like it had a chance of replacing my current setup, but it simply won't launch.
Running Budgie, won't launch or provide error message.

It launches perfectly if you install it through the terminal

sudo apt install skrooge
Very powerful program which is still very approachable and easy to use. Good for all levels of use. Single entry similar to Quicken.
won't open at all, does not even show the symbol... just a white square with a gear icon

summary: Install it from Terminal to work

description: Great app that gives you insight into your monthly finances. Visuals help you
Thanks for all.

I gave up the Quicken tax and settled on Skrooge for my personal finance manager. It does most every thing I need. The only thing I miss from Quicken is the single click to update all my accounts at once. I could probably set that up, but haven't taken the time to do it.

Whenever I've submitted a bug, the response hsa been quick. The developers are responsive.
summary: Great, free personal finance management app

description: Unable to find Canadian banks nor financial institutions
Ive been using Skrooge for many years. Tried most others and none compared to the flexibility and ease of use Skrooge provides.
summary: Without doubt the best finance manager

description: Like others in this thread, the app doesnt load or run on my system.

In my opinion, Skrooge is the best personal finance software. Also, it is the only one that has all the feature I require from such a software. A big "thank you" to all the people involved into developing it.

I've used this on Ubuntu & Fedora as a Quicken replacement for years. Tends to work best installed as a Flatpak or Snap so it's up-to-date. Also, if you're using Gnome you may get better results if you also install the KDE Plasma desktop or KDE Plasma Window Manager. You can still use Gnome, but the Skrooge user interface seems to run more like the designer intended if KDE is installed. Hope that helps!
Don't know why but it wouldn't launch - all I could do was un-install
If it would work it looks like it would be amazing
Does not work at all on my Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, so 1 star
summary: Puzzled, installed but did not started

description:
Nice and great application.
I use it to manage 12 accounts and over 8000 entries. Never been caught out.

There is something wrong with the Snap. If I try to start Skroog in the terminal I get the following error: /snap/skrooge/24/kf5-launch: line 209: /snap/skrooge/24/kf5-locale-gen: No such file or directory
And still nothing has been done.

Das Programm lässt sich nach der Installation per Discover nicht starten. Vermutlich mal wieder ein SNAP-Problem. Langsam nervt das.
Die Installation gelingt problemlos, wenn man nach der Anleitung auf der Projekthomepage vorgeht.
https://skrooge.org/ubuntu_installation
Welche Pfeifen geben einer Software ne schlechte Bewertung, nur weil dieser Canonical Snap-Mist nicht funktioniert? Nutzt halt entweder das normale Paket oder Flatpak, wie normale Menschen...
Null Reaktion. Programm läßt sich auch nach Neutstart des Betriebssystems nicht starten.
no inicia la aplicación, no la pude utilizar
Logiciel de comptabilité extrêmement soigné.
application assez complète,

C'est une application bien complète.
Je l'utilise depuis plusieurs années pour gérer plusieurs comptes, elle fait le boulot.
L'actualisation de version s'est faite sans problème.
La flexibilité de l'affichage des opérations, des rapports, etc...est simple et fonctionnelle.
Merci aux développeurs
très bonne application , comptes faciles à argumenter
Rien ne s' installe dans ce foutu ubuntu 20.04
toujours NULL ... s'installe toujours pas sous UBUNTU 22.4 ! Soit il devient utilisable, ou il faut le sortir de software-center.

Après avoir essayé plusieurs outils de gestion financière (Grisbi, GnuCash, KMyMoney...), Skrooge est de loin le plus complet. Très simple à configurer et à utiliser. Seul bémol: la présentation (tableaux et rapports) est améliorable
summary: Logiciel très complet et facile à configurer

description:
J'ai pu récupérer mes comptes provenants d' un ancien logiciel et actuellement je peux manipuler sur 12 comptes différents plus de 8000~ écritures depuis 2007 .
Vous pouvez assigner un fichier .jpg en tant que facture à une ligne d'écriture avec la fonction proprièté . Récupérer des écritures par mois ou année et les retrouver dans différents signets qui peuvent s'ouvrir automatiquement à l'ouverture du logiciel. 
Je l'ai utilisé avec les version kubuntu 18.04 à 22.04.

andrei@X570-GAMING-X:~$ skrooge 
/snap/skrooge/24/kf5-launch: line 209: /snap/skrooge/24/kf5-locale-gen: No such file or directory
пользуюсь третий год и более чем доволен функционалом этой программы для домашних нужд (и не только). Большое спасибо разработчикам за их труд!
